website_summaries.verdict: The step configuration is closer to a ladder than stairs, but we believe users will appreciate the stability and durability. Additional installation hardware may be required.
pros: Lightweight, but very stable in final position
Pivoting bottom rung for sloping pools
Extra-wide 24 inches steps for easier entrance and exit
cons: Plastic steps are narrow, uncomfortable on feet
Will not fit a 54-inch pool easily

website_summaries.verdict: A well-made stainless steel ladder for your aboveground pool that is as sturdy as the ones made for in-ground pools.
pros: Pivot step on the bottom rung
Can work in a saltwater pool
Includes anchors for your pool deck
cons: The bolts on the clamps tend to rust
Steps aren't as wide as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, affordable, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: sorry the photo is sideways.... This is a very sturdy ladder; handles 300 lbs easily it's easy to assemble, came packaged very well, in only a few days. I had to contact customer service for 1 thing & was immediately replied to. Very good experience. This ladder will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: solid but steps only 3" wide and slippery
customer_reviews.text: The steps are sturdy for 200lb weight. 3" wide is too small and slippery. Will hurt feet. I will need to modify steps in order to use. Does come with deck flanges that are not listed in description. The bottom step will come off and put a hole in your liner. I secured it with straps. Ladder would have been great if mfg. fixed these problems. Also, I had to return the 1st one sent because it was damaged. Not very good packaging. I am going to use 4"-5" composite board on steps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tator

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a pool ladder.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder worked great for my 52” deep Leslie’s above-ground pool. My only gripe is that Amazon recommended I purchase the metal deck flanges to secure the ladder. The kit already comes with them so save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first review was declined by Amazon so I'll try ...
customer_reviews.text: My first review was declined by Amazon so I'll try again there is a manufacturing error, the step holes in different locations and ladder will not sit level in pool, Tech support is nonexistent they only provide a warranty email and have not responded to my request. Stay as far away as you can on this item.
customer_reviews.author: JFN

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made ladder. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, it's very difficult to remove protective film from steps. It arrived with dents in multiple areas of metal. Screws didn't fit properly. putting it together wasn't as easy as you guys make sound. It arrived late. Box was ripped. I had to keep it because it didn't want my kids to miss their summer they needed a ladder to go in the pool. Your product is not worth $190.00+ dollars. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maklin A.

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ladder for most above ground pools. Easy to assemble. I had to either cut holes in my deck or cut the ends of the handles off to mount the ladder so the bottom of the ladder would rest on the bottom of the pool. I cut holes in the deck using a hole saw. This makes for a very solid mount. I only wish the steps were just slightly wider, but it's not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit 54" pool.
customer_reviews.text: Was ordered a second time. Listing says this ladder is for a 54" pool, it is NOT. It may fit up to 52" but doesn't fit a 54". This was a pain to deal with since I had to manipulate my decking in order to get this to fit properly. Amazon rep was not very helpful. I dreaded having to call a second time to complain so I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Diduch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder very sturdy. The ladder is a bit slippery climb in pool.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy ladder.
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is very flimsy. The part broke that attaches to the deck. When it did the average sized person on the ladder fell and the ladder hit the side of the pool causing 3 holes in the liner. This happened 2 days after the 30 day return policy. Do not waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Haynes

customer_reviews.title: designed well
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the ladders with the plastic steps, they break. This one is designed well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: While installation was pretty simple, I find the steps on the ladder ...
customer_reviews.text: While installation was pretty simple, I find the steps on the ladder to be uncomfortable. They are a little narrower than I expected and they actually hurt my feet. I wish I could find replacement steps that are wider. Also I didn't realize the weight limit of 225 lbs. I have to keep that in mind if we have guests.
customer_reviews.author: Michele I

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: We are very impressed by the quality of this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Riney

customer_reviews.title: Need deck skrews
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ladder. Flanges have to be cut. I have a 54 inch pool with a inch and half lip and still had to be be trimmed. Thankful my husband had a grinder to cut it. It comes with all parts but the deck skrews.
customer_reviews.author: Ski-Zag

customer_reviews.title: Steps are slippery , I need to buy nonslip tape for the steps
customer_reviews.text: Steps are slippery , I need to buy nonslip tape for the steps
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bent rail :(
customer_reviews.text: Received our ladder today. One of the main stainless steel rails was bent when we opened the box. Not very happy. The box it came in was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: KatB

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for pool with a deck
customer_reviews.text: This ladder solved our problem of plastic ladders floating up and not touching the pool bottom.. This is a very sturdy ladder that is anchored into and through the deck. It is easily adjusted to fit your pool height and can be easily removed when needed at season end.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and comfortable on your feet
customer_reviews.text: We have now owned this ladder for over two years and it has lasted very well. It is sturdy and comfortable on your feet. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JM, B

customer_reviews.title: Dented handrail due to shipper
customer_reviews.text: I was so unhappy to receive the item damaged! I had my guys installing the deck and ready to put it up. Yet the box looked great but handrail was dented inside. Now this will cost me another few hundred dollars to get installed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Well built, and works great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my pool. Just what we needed for the deck to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, takes up less room in the pool than stairs. Keeps the pool vacuum from getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Nuspl

customer_reviews.title: very nice but the protective film takes a hour to remove very messy
customer_reviews.text: protective film is a mess spend more time on removeing it than assembly
customer_reviews.author: mitchiel

customer_reviews.title: Rusts after only a few weeks!
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is ok it’s not as sturdy as I would have thought, and after only a few weeks in the pool it has already started to rust!
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder, however the white pieces that hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder, however the white pieces that hold it on the deck are starting to rust and it's only been less than two months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent ladder. However the bottom comes off when lifting ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent ladder. However the bottom comes off when lifting the ladder out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our above ground pool. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kd23

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked nicely for my pool. I cut down the tubes to fit my 48” pool.
customer_reviews.author: ks132

customer_reviews.title: Steps are too narrow
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but the steps are too narrow & there very slick. I'm going to try & order wider steps to replace the current ones or we will have to get another new ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working well for us!
customer_reviews.text: We read all the reviews before ordering and decided to try this one. So far so good! Attached to composite decking if anyone is interested.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made item. Sturdy and it looks very clean in my pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EAsy to put together and install
customer_reviews.text: It comes with the deck mounts. I have a dolphin robot cleaner so it's easy to just pull up the ladder and let it go.
customer_reviews.author: bkourim

customer_reviews.title: Like some of the previous reviews the box was completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the previous reviews the box was completely destroyed upon delivery, however the contents were fine. The ladder does include a pair of white aluminum deck flanges so there is no need to order them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Krizzo James

customer_reviews.title: Best ladder we've had
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, did not come with screws, but, we had plenty around the house lol. Best ladder we've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement ladder
customer_reviews.text: Have installed and used all summer. Only complaint would be that the bend in the tubing should be a little wider, other than that it has performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: J & D M

customer_reviews.title: In-pool ladder
customer_reviews.text: First the packaging for this product needs to be improved. When it arrived one whole end of the box was gone! I was surprised everything was still inside. It went together easily enough, only took about 10 minutes to assemble. The part I don't care for is that the steps are straight up and down, where I'm used to our old ladder that had more of a step like quality to it. This being said, it is harder to climb in and out especially since the steps are medal and they are slippery. The thing I do like is it is stainless steel and won't rust in my pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble, comes with mounting brackets, seems sturdy under my 260 lbs. Does have a plastic base plate that I question how long that will last. I cut to length for my application.
customer_reviews.author: stephen rush

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy
customer_reviews.text: No issues easy to install. My 14 year old did it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle joyce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and still in excellent condition well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Hanne Gluth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good quality. Moderately sturdy. Clamp bolts rusted quickly. Clamp bolts crush walls of ladder tubing when tightened down. Still a better deal than 2 other ladders I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Our kids bought this ladder for their above ground and are 100% pleased with this product. They thoroughly enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very well made, easy to assemble and looks great. All the hard wear is included for easy installment . It does stand very straight in the water which is different than ladder that came with our pool. Overall my husband and I are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wells

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Easily assembled
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel design is sturdy and easily installed. It comes with the flanges even though that is not mentioned. I trimmed the "hook ends" to fit my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this ladder
customer_reviews.text: We love this ladder. We have owned stairs (2 different plastic models) and they are difficult to keep in place and cheaply made (mainly handles). This ladder is great, easy to assemble, sturdy and very nice looking. We are very happy with out choice. Box arrived in tact and delivery was quick. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten L Kelly-Vargas

customer_reviews.title: a bit cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straightforward. All the materials are flimsier than I expected. The tubes are pretty lightweight material, and the plastic steps feel under built. I'll wait and see if it holds up under use.
customer_reviews.author: Art Friend

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First ladder received had poles of 2 different lengths. Returned it and received 2nd ladder with poles correct but holes not aligned in both poles. I had to drill holes in correct location.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Pascoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it today works great nice and stable I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Herman Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Thanks great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel ladder, just as expected. Mounting brackets are delivered with set. Thanks great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Not as sturdy as an in ground pool ladder but very solid
customer_reviews.author: David Varian

customer_reviews.title: This item is an overpriced piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is made of very thin tubing and the bottom rung that swivels is made if thin plastic. I wish I did more shopping in pool stores instead of taking a shot in the dark. This item is an overpriced piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and it was just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna N.

customer_reviews.title: bummed :(
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the all Stainless Steel In-Pool Ladder NE1145 and received one with plastic steps. Had to return it, they did give us a full refund plus s&h, but now they're out of stock and we don't have a ladder to get in and out of our pool. Besides getting the wrong ladder, the service has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGregor

product_meta.title: Blue Wave NE1145 Premium Stainless Steel In-Pool Ladder for Above Ground Pools
product_meta.description: The Premium Stainless Steel In-pool Ladder brings the quality and strength of an in-ground ladder to your above ground pool. Make exiting and entering your pool easier than ever before. This Premium model features stainless steel steps that will not fade, crack or break. Our premium model is 24 in. wide with extra deep treads for sure footing. The ladder is designed to fit up to 54 in. deep pools. The base of the ladder pivots to conform to sloping bottoms for super safe contact. Comes with aluminum deck anchors for secure deck mounting. 1-Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: Fits above ground pools up to 54 in. deep. 300-lb capacity
Pivot bottom to accommodate sloped pool bottoms
Extra wide 24 in. width for easy entry and exit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
